Content: Colonel Sujeewa Jayasinghe of the Gemunu Watch (GW) assumed duties as the 18th Commander of the 553 Brigade in Jaffna amid religious observances on Friday (30). The newly-appointed Brigade Commander was welcomed to the Headquarters in a Guard Turnout at the main entrance. He placed his signature in an official document amid religious observances and symbolized the assumption of office. Similarly, tree planting and an All Rank tea arrangement were also held during the event with the participation of the Commanding Officer of the 1 Mechanized Infantry Regiment, Second in Command of 10 Vijayabhau Infantry Regiment and officers.
